games.name: Fibbage2
games.title: Fibbage 2
games.description: More Fibbage! Lie to your friends, avoid their lies, and spot the truth. “In Arizona, you must obtain a permit to feed ______ to pigs.” Go!

games.name: Earwax
games.title: Earwax
games.description: Cow moo? Huge explosion? Or tiny fart? Which to choose? It's the sound effects game that will leave you up to your ears in laughter!

games.name: Auction
games.title: Bidiots
games.description: Überbiete deine Gegner bei irrwitzigen (von anderen Spielern gezeichneten) Kunstwerken und gewinne dieses seltsam umkämpfte Auktionsspiel.

games.name: Quiplash
games.title: Quiplash XL
games.description: Das Duell des Witzes und der Witzigkeit in seiner GEWALTIGSTEN Form! Denke dir die lustigsten Antworten aus und gewinne das Spiel!

games.name: BombInterns
games.title: Bomb Corp.
games.description: Welcome to Bomb Corp. Interns of your kind must help defuse bombs in our office. It’s a weird office full of bombs. Just hit start.
